visualization_prompt: Generate a stock chart showing USD to EUR exchange rate trends using time-series data with responsive zoom controls
visualization_explanation:
The dataset contains 2D time-series financial data with datetime-value pairs (2006-2023). Synthetic data generation wasn't required as the implementation uses Highcharts' official sample dataset. The time axis maintains chronological integrity with UTC formatting while values show realistic FX rate ranges (0.63-1.60) preserving actual market volatility patterns.

This stock chart optimizes data-ink ratio by removing plot borders and markers while maintaining clear coordinate axes. The blue series color (#3498db) follows Cairo's preattentive processing principles for quick trend identification. Responsive design (300px container) and logarithmic zoom controls enable multi-scale analysis. The 14-day maxZoom threshold prevents over-interpretation of micro-fluctuations while maintaining 17-year historical context.
